publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7789 Bruce Crawford: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees— (a) the following revision to the programme of business for Wednesday 26 January— delete 5.00 pm Decision Time and insert 5.45 pm Decision Time (b) the following revision to the programme of business for Thursday 27 January— after followed by Financial Resolution: Reservoirs (Scotland) Bill insert followed by Scottish Government Debate: Dementia Strategy
